overview: Created by an all female filmmaking team, this 17-segment series focuses on the visceral gut reactions of each filmmaker to expand conversations about womenâ€™s reproductive rights and the importance of bodily autonomy and also addresses the issues of a democracy that does not protect the needs of the majority of the population.
tagline: A wild ride of an anthology reacting to the overturning of Roe v Wade through horror, dark comedy and sci-fi.
title: Give Me An A
